song_lyrics: Bhavsāgarmā sharaṇ achaḷ avināshī sāchā santnu;
Shruti smṛuti sākh, Hari harijannā prāṇ vachan bhagvantnu... °ṭek
Jem jaḷ tarang nahī bhed jadā, tem tej agni nahī bhinna tadā;
Em Hari harijan ek sadā... Bhavsāgarmā° 1
Jem kīṭ bhamarīne sang karī, gati īyaḷ tajīne thaī bhamarī;
Em Hariguru dhyāne pāme hari... Bhavsāgarmā° 2
Jem ker bor van vṛukṣha kayā, te chandan vāse chandan thayā;
Tenā nām rūp guṇ bhed gayā... Bhavsāgarmā° 3
Shrī mukhe kahyu mā’tam sant taṇu, ashvamedh yagnathī anantgaṇu;
Kahe Brahmānand shu kahu ghaṇu... Bhavsāgarmā° 4
title: Bhavsāgarmā sharaṇ achaḷ avināshī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-446: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
